promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a massive strong horse fire-type wearing red and white gemstones. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or fire:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Gemtusk, a massive strong horse fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: flame-burst. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word horse or fire or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, horse-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lava texture background
generatedDescription: Gemtusk roams the desert, a dust cloud in its wake. Its powerful burst of fiery energy commands respect.
